Dialogue.text: Good morning, Sector 7! Today is Jeha {current_day}. Overlord Aso just released a statement: "I very much am looking forward to my trip on the {overlord_day}th of Jeha."

Dialogue461.text: They continued, "it would make me incredibly sad if I were to miss it, but not as sad as it would make all the residents of my favorite podtown."

Dialogue470.text: In other news, leggings are again considered pants. Also, the CX-6 virus has killed thousands now in Sector 6.

Dialogue477.text: Those infected with CX-6 stay sick for 12 days on average, scientists say, and the elderly are among the most at risk of death.
